T02D3267:21b-5: sngar bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug par
T02D3267:21b-6: bsams la sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng
T02D3267:21b-7: du zla ba la yi ge dzam las byung ba'i
T02D3267:21b-8: bcom ldan 'das dzambha la bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3267:21b-11: rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan pa /
T02D3267:21b-12: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i phyag dag na ne'u le dang sa bon gyi thum po bsnams pa /
T02D3267:21b-13: rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3267:21b-15: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la ni nor
T02D3267:21b-16: bu bzang po dang gang ba bzang po dang nor
T02D3267:21b-17: sbyin dang rnam thos rnams so //
T02D3267:21b-18: me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la ni bzhad gad kyi phreng ba can dang /
T02D3267:21b-19: rnam par bkra ba'i aindra gdub can dang kha'i dbang dang dbang po'i mchog rnams so //
T02D3267:22a-0: de bzhin du ji skad bshad @22a * //
T02D3267:22a-1: ba'i rim pas de dag rnams nyid la nor rgyun ma dang zla ba dga' ma dang /
T02D3267:22a-2: sbyin ma dang legs par sbyin ma dang /
T02D3267:22a-3: 'phags ma dang rab tu bzang mo dang sped ma
T02D3267:22a-4: dang lha mo dang dbyangs can ma zhes bya ba'i
T02D3267:22a-5: gnod sbyin ma de dag rnams bsam par bya ba'o
T02D3267:22a-6: // nor rgyun ma na dzambha la dang bcas pa
T02D3267:22a-7: yin la gnod sbyin ma rnams ni nor rgyun ma
T02D3267:22a-8: // bzhin no // gnod sbyin rnams ni dzambha la bzhin no //
T02D3267:22a-9: de ltar bsgoms la gsang sngags bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3267:22a-10: de la gnod sbyin rnams kyi sngags ni aom ma ni bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-11: aom dzambha la dza lendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-12: aom p'u rna bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-13: aom dha na d'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-14: aom bee shr'a ma n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-15: aom ki li m'a li ne sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-16: aom pi tsi kunda li ne sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-17: aom mu khendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-18: aom ba rendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-19: de nas gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi sngags ni /
T02D3267:22a-20: aom ba su dh'a ri ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-21: aom tsandra k'am tyee sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-23: aom su datta yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-24: aom a'a rya yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-25: aom su bha dra yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-26: aom gu pta yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-27: aom de bi yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-28: aom sa ra sv'a tyee sv'a h'a /
T02D3267:22a-29: de ltar thun tshad gsum du bsgom zhing bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D3267:22a-30: chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad legs par phul pas khams gsum gyi rgyal srid gnang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3267:22a-31: nang par snga mo bya rog mi grag pa'i dus
T02D3267:22a-32: su chu'i nang du bzlas pas na zad pa med
T02D3267:22a-33: pa'i nor rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3267:22a-34: de nas gser la sogs pa'i gzhong par nor rgyun ma gnod sbyin mo rnams dang bcas pa dang /
T02D3267:22a-35: gzhong pa gnyis par bcom ldan 'das dzambha la dang
T02D3267:22a-36: gnod sbyin rnams kyis legs par bskor ba yongs su
T02D3267:22a-37: bris la kha sbyor du byas la mnyes par bya
T02D3267:22a-38: ste / dngos grub chen po brgyad kyang ster bar
T02D3267:22a-39: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dzambha la'i sgrub thabs
